title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Serverless full-stack in action: AI-driven developer experience  (DEV309)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 无服务器全栈实战：AI驱动的开发者体验 (DEV309)
abstract: Learn to build serverless full-stack applications from the ground up using Kiro CLI. This code-focused session is designed for builders new to AI coding assistants. Use natural language prompts to scaffold and build a complete serverless backend, create the frontend, and automate development workflows. See seamless console-to-IDE transitions and real-time architectural visualization as you build. Experience enhanced debugging and observability capabilities throughout the development process. You'll leave with skills and confidence to leverage AI assistance and the complete modern serverless developer experience on AWS.
abstract_cn: 学习使用 Kiro CLI 从零开始构建无服务器全栈应用程序。本次以代码为重点的会议专为刚接触 AI 编码助手的构建者设计。使用自然语言提示来搭建和构建完整的无服务器后端、创建前端并自动化开发工作流程。在构建过程中体验无缝的控制台到 IDE 转换以及实时架构可视化。在整个开发过程中体验增强的调试和可观测性功能。您将掌握利用 AI 辅助的技能和信心，以及在 AWS 上完整的现代无服务器开发者体验。
